message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM 

The paper deals with learning the 3D deformation of animals from 2D images, which involves computer vision (cs.CV) and computer graphics (cs.GR) techniques. The authors also propose a novel locally-bounded deformation energy, which involves optimization techniques (cs.LG) and machine learning (cs.AI) to learn the stiffness bounds. Finally, the paper demonstrates the effectiveness of their approach on cats and horses, which involves 3D modeling and animation (cs.MM).
